org.sakaiproject.emailtemplateservice.service

Interface EmailTemplateService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface EmailTemplateService

    • Method Detail

      • getEmailTemplate

        EmailTemplate getEmailTemplate(String key,
                             Locale locale)
        Get an email template in the default locale
        Parameters:
        key - the template key which identifies a template
        locale - the locale for the template
        Returns:
        an email template with this key or null if none can be found

      • getEmailTemplates

        List<EmailTemplate> getEmailTemplates(int max,
                                    int start)
        Get a list of all the email templates in the system
        Parameters:
        max - limit the number of items returned (0 for all)
        start - start with this item (0 for the first one)
        Returns:
        a list of templates

      • getRenderedTemplate

        RenderedTemplate getRenderedTemplate(String key,
                                   Locale locale,
                                   Map<String,String> replacementValues)
        Get a rendered Template in the specied locale
        Parameters:
        key - the template key which identifies a template
        locale - the locale for the template
        replacementValues - a set of replacement values which are in the map like so:
        key => value (String => String)
        username => aaronz
        course_title => Math 1001 Differential Equations
        Returns:
        the processed template

      • getRenderedTemplateForUser

        RenderedTemplate getRenderedTemplateForUser(String key,
                                          String userReference,
                                          Map<String,String> replacementValues)
        Get a template in the appropriate locale for a user - is the user has no preferred locale set the system default will be used
        Parameters:
        key - the template key which identifies a template
        userReference - the unique reference for a user (e.g. /user/aaronz)
        replacementValues - a set of replacement values which are in the map like so:
        key => value (String => String)
        username => aaronz
        course_title => Math 1001 Differential Equations
        Returns:
        the processed template

      • saveTemplate

        void saveTemplate(EmailTemplate emailTemplate)
        Save a template to storage
        Parameters:
        emailTemplate - an email template, cannot be null

      • updateTemplate

        void updateTemplate(EmailTemplate emailTemplate)
        update a template
        Parameters:
        emailTemplate - an email template, cannot be null

      • getEmailTemplateById

        EmailTemplate getEmailTemplateById(Long id)
        INTERNAL USE: get an email template by the unique id

      • getRenderedTemplates

        Map<EmailTemplateLocaleUsers,RenderedTemplate> getRenderedTemplates(String key,
                                                                  List<String> userReferences,
                                                                  Map<String,String> replacementValues)
        Utility method for getting templates for many users messages to many users
        Parameters:
        templateId -
        user - references e.g. "/user/admin"
        Returns:

      • sendRenderedMessages

        void sendRenderedMessages(String key,
                        List<String> userReferences,
                        Map<String,String> replacementValues,
                        String from,
                        String fromName)
        Utility method that will construct the Mesages and send them
        Parameters:
        key - template key
        userReferences - list of user references (e.g /user/admin)
        replacementValues -

      • processEmailTemplates

        void processEmailTemplates(List<String> templatePaths)
        Takes the list of paths supplied and looks up the XML files using the services classloader. Each file is parsed into an EmailTemplate and saved.
        Parameters:
        templatePaths - A List of template path Strings

                         Locale locale)

        Parameters:

        locale -
        Returns:

        Returns:
